import Badge from '@site/src/components/badges';  

**(6 Fields, 6 Collected, Delimited)**

**Target Table: `INCIDENT_OFFNDR_PARENT_INVOLVE`**

| **Load Sequence/Dependencies** |
|--------------------------------|
| INCIDENT                       |
| PERSON                         |
| INCIDENT OFFENDER              |

## Template Description
This template connects an incident and the offender to one or multiple parental involvement types. If there are multiple parental involvement types for an incident/offender, include multiple records within this template with the same Incident ID and Offender ID. If there is no parental involvement, do not submit a record in this template.

## Template Specifications {#template-specs}

---
### 1 - SUBMITTING AUN
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={9} /></p>

The unique, 9-digit AUN assigned by the PDE where the incident took place.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

All LEA and School Numbers can be found on the [EdNA website](http://www.edna.pa.gov/Screens/wfHome.aspx).

`123456789`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `SUBMITTING DISTRICT CODE`

---
### 2 - INCIDENT ID
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={30} /></p>

An identifier assigned by the LEA to the incident; this identifier must be unique within each LEA per school year.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`9801`
</details>

---
### 3 - OFFENDER ID
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={20} /></p>

An identifier for the offender involved in an incident.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
Must be the same value used in Field 2 - [PERSON ID](docs/templates/discipline/person.mdx#2---person-id) within the Person Template.
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`887`
</details>

---
### 4 - PARENTAL INVOLVEMENT CODE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={1} /></p>

The code of the parental involvement type for the offender and incident.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

- `1` – written notification
- `2` – telephone conference
- `3` – school conference
- `4` – family counseling
- `5` – law enforcement / legal involvement
- `6` – other
</details>

---
### 5 - SCHOOL YEAR DATE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

A single date (June 30), the last day of the current school year indicating the whole school year.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`2024-06-30`
</details>

---
### 6 - PARENTAL INVOLVEMENT COMMENT
<p><Badge color="conditional" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={500} /></p>

Comment regarding the parental involvement.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
Required if the Field 4 - [PARENTAL INVOLVEMENT CODE](#4---parental-involvement-code) = `6`.
:::

---
## Rules
See the Rules Section of the Template Domain
